metadata.Title: CVE-2010-2529 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in ping.c in iputils 20020927, 20070202,20071127, and 20100214 on Mandriva Linux allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (hang) via a crafted echo response.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-2529` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

iputils-arping - 3:20100418-2ubuntu1
iputils-clockdiff - 3:20100418-2ubuntu1
iputils-ping - 3:20100418-2ubuntu1
iputils-tracepath - 3:20100418-2ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: iputils package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3:20100418-2ubuntu1').
